description: In this painting, we see a man wearing a black jacket and white shirt. He has dark hair and a beard. He is sitting on a chair with his legs crossed. His right hand is resting on his knee and his left hand is holding a book. The background of the painting is blue and there are some trees and bushes behind him. There is also a small table next to him with some books on it. This painting was painted by Manuel Cus√≠ i Ferret in 1875. It is part of the Art Nouveau movement and it is made out of oil paint and canvas. The subject matter of this painting is portraiture and it falls under the genre of "portrait". This painting can be found in Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya in Barcelona, Spain.
